alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 541 PM MDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Glenwood Springs to near Rifle to near De Beque and moving southeast at 35 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Glenwood Springs around 545 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 53 and 71, and between mile markers 83 and 129. Colorado 13 near mile marker 1. Colorado 65 between mile markers 49 and 56. Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 7. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas
